name: Checkmate, mate
description:
Play unusual chess as you navigate through a spooky dungeon. Use cards to defeat pieces.

You can move and rotate the camera:

W - move forward
A - move left
S - move back
D - move right
Q - turn the camera to the left
E - turn the camera to the right

Move your mouse over the cards to use them.

On each floor there is a door, passing through which you can move further.
